messages.content: Boris Johnson’s Conservatives think they’re born to rule. They will only look after the privileged few. As your MP I'll deliver the real change Rochester & Strood needs.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Government’s Brexit deal has done nothing to make our community stronger. A Labour Government will deliver a final say referendum and negotiate a better EU deal.
Labour will deliver an industrial revolution that will restore our environment and create new skilled jobs for future generations.
Your children deserve access to properly funded education. Labour will champion our comprehensive schools, deliver free school meals for all primary school children, and reverse cuts to Sure Start.

issues.brexitEurope: The Government’s Brexit deal has done nothing to make our community stronger. A Labour Government will deliver a final say referendum and negotiate a better EU deal.
issues.education: Labour will champion our comprehensive schools, deliver free school meals for all primary school children, and reverse cuts to Sure Start.
issues.environment: Labour will deliver an industrial revolution that will restore our environment and create new skilled jobs for future generations.

community.content: Labour will create a local development fund to help community projects in Rochester & Strood.

endorsements.endorsement: The Tories are not holding Rochester & Strood back.
